actions.text: Referred to the Committee on Finance.

official_title: A resolution expressing the sense of the Senate that the President should work with the Government of the United Kingdom to prepare for a future free trade agreement between the United States and the United Kingdom.

summary.text: This resolution expresses the sense of the Senate that the President, with the support of Congress, should prepare for a future trade agreement between the United States and the United Kingdom.

titles.title: A resolution expressing the sense of the Senate that the President should work with the Government of the United Kingdom to prepare for a future free trade agreement between the United States and the United Kingdom.

A resolution expressing the sense of the Senate that the President should work with the Government of the United Kingdom to prepare for a future free trade agreement between the United States and the United Kingdom.
